oveFan_activate.Description: Activation for Integer signal to control the heat pump evaporator fan either on or off

oveFan_u.Description: Integer signal to control the heat pump evaporator fan either on or off

oveHeaPumY_activate.Description: Activation for Heat pump modulating signal for compressor speed between 0 (not working) and 1 (working at maximum capacity)

oveHeaPumY_u.Description: Heat pump modulating signal for compressor speed between 0 (not working) and 1 (working at maximum capacity)

ovePum_activate.Description: Activation for Integer signal to control the emission circuit pump either on or off

ovePum_u.Description: Integer signal to control the emission circuit pump either on or off

oveTSet_activate.Description: Activation for Zone operative temperature setpoint
